name: Tempest (itch) (Nenn)
description:
Information
Tempest is an atmospheric walking simulator / interactive fiction game created in Unity during the World Game Design course at I.T. University (ITU) in Copenhagen, Denmark, 2022. 

The game was developed by a team of seven students over a period of 3 months and is part of an exam project in world-building. Tempest is meant as a preview to a longer game and lasts for about 20-30 minutes.

Game Hook
In Tempest, the player must explore a society in a constant time loop, its inhabitants overflowing memories that actively eat away at the world itself and attempt to understand their past to resolve the future.
